name: Billy%27s_partner
text:
Billy's partner
A South Dakota Highway Patrol officer responded to the scene of an accident with Billy.
Biography
The trooper arrived with Billy at a country road near Buckhorn, where Dale Cooper's doppelganger had run off the road and vomited up a toxic substance. As he approached the driver's side door, Billy became sick to his stomach, doubling over and warning his partner to stay away. The other trooper radioed for backup and advised that they bring gas masks.
